name: Iskander
bio:
Iskander, I am working as a software engineer with the Privacy, Scaling and Explorations team within the Ethereum Foundation [1][2]. Mainly I work on applied cryptography applications and recently working on developing a browser extension for generating zero-knowledge proofs computed in the client using Semaphore protocol [3]. I graduated in 2019 with a  bachelor's degree in computer science. I am interested in applied cryptography, privacy, decentralized systems and philosophy.  
[1]: https://pse.dev
[2]: https://github.com/0xisk
[3]: https://github.com/CryptKeeperZK/crypt-keeper-extension
